rule.name: To avoid opening all ports for Allow rules, EC2 NetworkACL Entry Protocol should be specified
rule.description: To avoid opening all ports for Allow rules, EC2 NetworkACL Entry Protocol should be either 6 (for TCP), 17 (for UDP), 1 (for ICMP), or 58 (for ICMPv6, which must include an IPv6 CIDR block, ICMP type, and code).

rule.name: TCP/UDP protocol NetworkACL entries possibly should not allow all ports.
rule.description: TCP/UDP protocol NetworkACL entries possibly should not allow all ports.
